data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Maule, Chile that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maule, Chile
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Maule, Chile.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Maule, Chile.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Maule, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Make the Jew, Spanish-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Maule, Chile.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Maule, Chile to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maule, Chile has a population of 955,000.

We estimate Maule has 219,849 people who might know Jesus, 612,261 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 122,890 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 191 new simple churches in the state of Maule, Chile. Place a simple church in every community of the 955,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.
